response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand its worth to you is $8,000. Considering the high demand and unique features of this product, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to secure this valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product.", "product_price": 7500}
